name: Cardolon [1666]
description:
My submission to the MashUp Game Jam 2022.

The year is 1666, and London is burning. Entrusted with the elemental cards, can you prevent the destruction of all London?

Cardolon is a turn-based card game featuring strategy elements, where you must prevent the destruction of London using the four elemental cards (listed below). Rather than earning a score as the game goes along, you start off with as high a score as you can ever get. At the start, all tiles are worth 100 points. As a tile burns or is destroyed in some other manner, it's worth slowly decreases. At the start of each turn, it is possible for a special event to occur, such as a dragon attack or the river flooding.

  • Fire - Burn a group of tiles, preventing fire from spreading there
  • Water - Put out the fire in a group of tiles
  • Earth - Build a wall, entirely blocking the fire's path.
  • Wind - Change the wind direction, impacting the fire's spread. Fire can jump over water and burnt tiles if the wind is right.

Check the in-game tutorial for more information.

CONTROLS:
  • Mouse Motion - Movement in the menu / game
  • Left Click - Selection in the menu / game
  • Right Click - Deselection
  • On-screen button - Discard the selected card
